titles.title: Voters' Bill of Rights Resolution of 1994

Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3835) to establish a National Advisory Referendum on limiting the terms of Members of Congress at the general election of 1994, and for amendments adding new titles dealing with advisory referenda on the balanced budget amendment and Line Item Veto Act, the Sunshine for Committees Act, the Private Property Protection Act, and Miscellaneous Reform Amendments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 4/19/1994--Introduced. Voters' Bill of Rights Resolution of 1994 - Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3835 (establishing a national advisory referendum on limiting the terms of Members of Congress at the general election of 1994).
